alert.note: Alert for Judith Gap; Melville Foothills; Northern Park; Northern Sweet Grass; Paradise Valley; Red Lodge Foothills; Southern Wheatland (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 11 at 1:38AM MDT until April 11 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds gusting up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of central and south central Montana. * WHEN...From 6 AM this morning to 9 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Strong crosswinds will make travel difficult along Highway 191 from Big Timber through Judith Gap, along Interstate 90 around Big Timber, and roads along the Beartooth Foothills. Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Paradise Valley has the highest chance to see gusts around 60 mph.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution and consider postponing travel until winds subside, or take an alternate route.

area.areaDesc: Judith Gap; Melville Foothills; Northern Park; Northern Sweet Grass; Paradise Valley; Red Lodge Foothills; Southern Wheatland
